resolution_summary: The missing claim record for the specified member and claim details was successfully added to the claims_medical table.
steps_taken: Identified the missing row in the claims_medical table.
Gathered the necessary member and claim details.
Executed the SQL command to add the missing claim record.
Verified the addition of the record in the claims_medical table.
lessons_learned: Regular audits of the claims_medical table can help prevent missing records.
Documenting changes in the database can improve tracking of modifications.
follow_up_actions: Schedule a review of the claims_medical table for completeness.
Implement a monitoring system for future discrepancies in the database.
